about_the_game:
You are a master of martial arts.

With your sharpened senses, everything seems to happen in slow motion.

There is no Life gauge. A master's attacks hit vital points precisely, so a single hit result in an instant KO. Dodge the enemy's attack and deliver a fatal blow.

■Single Story

The time is Reiwa. A martial arts tournament to determine the true strongest is being held...

Six masters take to the battlefield with their own thoughts in mind.

Witness the end of the story and become a witness to history.

■Local 2P Battle

Enjoy a match between a friend and a master!

■Online 2P Battle

Choose your favorite master and jump into battle with the whole world.

You can also participate with an edited character and show off your favorite outfit! Show off your battle sense and visual sense!

■Avatar Creation

[Create your own avatar by customizing your name, body shape, hairstyle, facial expression, voice, accessories, pose, and dialogue!]

You can set up your avatar's facial expression and body shape with sliders, and even change the attack voice to your own voice!

You can also change the attack voice to your own voice!

■Online Gallery

You can upload your avatar to the online gallery.

Uploaded avatars can be viewed by players all over the world at any time,

If you find one you like, you can download it!

■Streamer Config

In online matches, you can expect to play with a variety of custom characters,

You can switch the display of each item from “Distributor Settings”.

・Name display = Display character's name, school, and hometown.

・Appearance = Character's appearance, clothing and accessories

・Character's dialogue = Character's dialogue is displayed.

・Character's voice = Playback of character's voice.

=====================================================

Streaming and videotaping gameplay and monetizing them are all OK!

======================================================
